newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Manila Central Banks lowers term rates.
newsitem.headline: Manila Central Banks lowers term rates.

text.p: The Philippine Central Bank said on Thursday it lowered term reverse repo (rrp) rates by 0.375 percentage points each.

The five day and one-month rrp rates are now 10.5 percent from 10.875, two-month rrp 10.625 percent from 11.0 percent, three-month rrp 10.8125 percent from 11.1875 percent, and six-month rrp 11.125 percent from 11.50 percent.
The adjustment in rates followed the two percentage point-cut in the Central Bank's overnight rates early on Thursday.
